title: By the King, a proclamation containing His Majesties gracious and ample indemnity
author: Scotland. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James VII)
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,
notes: "Given at our court at White-hall, the twenty fifth day of September, 1688. And of our reign, the fourth year."
Imperfect: cropped around royal arms of head.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
